biotools.summary: This package provides methods to compute co-expression networks of lincRNAs and protein-coding genes. Biological terms associated with sets of protein-coding genes predict the biological contexts of lincRNAs according to the 'Guilty by Association' approach.

bioschemas.name: LINC
bioschemas.summary: This package provides methods to compute co-expression networks of lincRNAs and protein-coding genes. Biological terms associated with sets of protein-coding genes predict the biological contexts of lincRNAs according to the 'Guilty by Association' approach.
